turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I get a caramel macchiato for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, where did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on Baltimore National Pike way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and it can have whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want it iced or regular?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall caramel machiato with whipped cream from the starbucks on Baltimore National Pikeway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great I've placed your order and it will be ready in 15 minutes.
